Content:: Griesheim (German pronunciation: [ˈɡʁiːsˌhaɪ̯m] (listen)) is a quarter of Frankfurt am Main, Germany. It is part of the Ortsbezirk West. Griesheim had been an independent town until 1928, the year of its suburbanisation. It is located between Nied, Sossenheim, Bockenheim, Gallus and Schwanheim. Media related to Frankfurt-Griesheim at Wikimedia Commons  This Hesse location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
